question: Whistleblowers Protection Bill became a law in which of the following years?
explanation: In the year 2011 the Whistleblowers Protection Bill was proposed which finally became a law in 2014. The Whisteleblowers Protection Act, 2014 established a mechanism to receive complaints related to disclosure of allegations of corruption or willful misuse of power or discretion, against any public servant. It also established a mechanism to inquire or cause an inquiry into such disclosure.
